question:
Which among the following pairs of Agricultural Revolution is/are correctly matched?
  1. White Revolution - Milk Production
  2. Black Revolution - Fertilizer production
  3. Round Revolution - Potato production
  4. Silver Revolution - Petroleum production
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
White Revolution - Milk Production
Grey Revolution - Fertilizer production
Round Revolution - Potato production
Silver Revolution - Egg/Poultry production
Black RevolutionÂ  - Petroleum production
